2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Translates Astonishing X-Men #48-51.

"I Hate It When He Does That" part 1! When Batman visits the scene of a break-in, the GCPD expect him to blame Catwoman. But Bruce smells a different scent in the air...one that reminds him of being a young boy, touring the world with Alfred. Could his past be coming back to haunt him?
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: I Hate it When He Does That, Part 1 of 3

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: One year ago, on Earth 2, as Oliver and Chloe plotted to defeat Ultraman, Lois feared for her husband's life. Today, Chloe is seeing visions of that meeting, but before she can tell Oliver what happend, she turns her focus to Superman and Impulse's battle in Las Vegas!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Haunted Part 10

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
THE ETERNAL QUESTION

Class 3-A has finally had enough of Negi and his philandering ways! They've devised an elaborate plot for revenge, but everything changes when they discover that their young teacher may actually have some small affection for one special girl. Can Negi escape with his secret intact, or will they make him talk?

Chapter Titles

  • 346th Period: Discovery? Negi Has A True Love!!?
  • 347th Period: The Love Won't Stop!!
  • 348th Period: We Have Ways of Making You Talk ♥
  • 349th Period: I Want To Protect Negi ♥
  • 350th Period: An Endless Journey
  • 351st Period: Bye, Guys!
  • 352nd Period: 100 Years of Memories
  • 353rd Period: Onward, To the Future
  • 354th Period: Magical Super Sleuth Yue ♥
  • 355th Period: 3-A Forever
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: The Eternal Question

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: What's worse than a supervillain? Green Hornet asks that very question when he teams up with the nefarious Nikki Stripez to crack a ring of human traffickers in Century City. What price will this deal with a devil cost Britt Reid? Heroes and villains unite!

Venom's evolution as Philadelphia's makeshift, seat-of-your-pants Avenger continues!

But is KATY KIERNAN dead set on learning all Venom's secrets?

How does Flash protect his secret identity while trying to protect himself from a hit that's been called on him?
It's a race for power, with Prophets seeking to enslave the children of Badrock to use them as living weapons against a new mysterious foe.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: [untitled]

Join the gang as they dress up and host the TV show themselves to unravel what’s really causing a scene behind the set!

Errol was right not to trust anyone. Now he and Frank are prisoners of a crazy priest and are living bait for the Crossed. But these men on a mission don't die easy and the story ain't over until the beatnik and the biker get their revenge. SIMON SPURRIER's uniquely twisted tales show us a fresh side of Crossed but with all the gore and horror of the classics.

Available with a Regular, Torture, Wraparound, and special Red Crossed Incentive covers by Rafael Ortiz.

In Buddha: The Hag and the Waif, Devadatta escapes the clutches of his captors and flees into the city. Unable to tell friend from foe, the wolf-boy falls into the devious care of the hag Ghagra, who sees murderous potential in little Devadatta. What will the wolf-boy decide as heís groomed for the hagís desire for revenge? Also included are Astro Boy, Dororo,and Black Jack.

  • Buddha Part Three: The Hag and the Waif Chapter Two

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: This Digital Exclusive features OVER 150 PAGES of content, including a special appearance by Sabrina the Teenage Witch! Love is in the air in Riverdale! Archie, Betty, Veronica, and the whole gang have been struck by Cupid's arrow, and you can join in the fun with this oversized Digital Exclusive! Read on to see if Archie can juggle his Valentine's Day dates. Will Reggie and Cheryl create a love connection? And if Ethel isn't giving Jughead boxes of chocolates, who is?! With over 150 pages of content, you'll LOVE this digital-only special!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Archie's Sweet Hearts
